name: Asymmetrical Multiplayer Game (JaceMC)
description:
Design prompt 4- A simple shooter game where Player 1 (Red dude) is a larger boss character and Player 2 (Blue dude) is a character trying to beat the boss

Player 1 Controls:

D - Up

S - Down

Space(hold) - Shoot

Player 2 Controls:

Arrows to move

Left Mouse Click (Not hold) - Shoot
